data.title: How many styles of music are there?
data.meta_description: GameDev.net is your resource for game development with forums, tutorials, blogs, projects, portfolios, news, and more.
data.text:
Quote:

2Step

4-beat

Alternative country - reaction against the 1990s highly-polished Nashville sound

Alternative hip hop - reaction against gangsta rap, usually includes socially or politically aware lyrics (also known as alternative rap or Bohemian hip hop)

Alternative metal - catch-all term for heavy metal mixed with punk, funk, hip hop or other influences

Alternative rock - broad movement reacting against the perceived sterility of 1970s pop music with generally inaccessible lyrics and accompaniment
